remarks: Define real apartness.  Definition in Section 11.2.1 of [HoTT], p. (varies).  Although ` #RR ` is an apartness relation on the reals (see ~ df-ap for more discussion of apartness relations), for our purposes it is just a stepping stone to defining ` # ` which is an apartness relation on complex numbers.  On the reals, ` #RR ` and ` # ` agree ( ~ apreap ).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 26-Jan-2020.)
statement:
df-reap $p |- #RR = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. RR /\ y e. RR ) /\ ( x < y \/ y < x ) ) } $.
$d x y $.
